Translations.Text: Wo qishi mu sa:“Ni reng chu ni de shouzhang ba!” Na shouzhang turan tunmole tamen suo biaoyan de huanshu.
Yushi zhenli xianmingliao, tamen [moshu shi] suo biaoyan de zhishi tulao.
Tamen dangchang bei jibai, chengwei quru zhe.
Yushi moshu shimen zhihao baidao xiaqu.
Tamen shuo:“Women xinyang zhong shijie de zhule,
ji mu sa he ha lun de zhu.”
Falao shuo:“Zai wo zhunxu nimen zhiqian, nimen gan xiangxin ta [mu sa] ma? Zhe yiding shi nimen zai cheng li mimou de guiji, xiang jie ci ba cheng li ren dou quzhu chuqu. Nimen bujiu jiang zhidao:
Wo yiding yao jiaocuo kan qu nimen de shoujiao, ranhou ba nimen dou ding si zai shizijia shang.”
Tamen shuo:“Women yiding yao gui xin women de zhu.
Ni [falao] baofu women, zhi yin women xinyang women de zhu jiang shi women de jixiang. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni ba jianren zhuru women, qiu ni rang women chengwei musilin hou zai siwang.”

Falao renmin zhong de shoulingmen shuo:“Ni neng rang mu sa he ta de zuren zai guonei zuo'e er paoqi ni ji ni de shenlingmen ma?” Ta [falao] shuo:“Women jiang sha si tamen de nanhai, zhi rang tamen de funu huozhe. Women dique you nengli tongzhi tamen.”
Mu sa dui ta de zuren shuo:“Nimen qiu an la xiangzhu ba! Nimen jianren [zhu] ba! Dadi que shi an la de, ta shi tasuo yiyu de puren jicheng ta. Shan guo shi shuyu jingwei zhe de.”

Tamen [mu sa de zuren] shuo:“Zai ni lai women zheli qian, women shou nuedai; zai ni lai women zheli hou, women ye shou nuedai.” Ta shuo:“Nimen de zhu [an la] yexu yao huimie nimen de diren, rang nimen zuo guonei de jiren zhe, yibian ta [an la] guancha nimen ruhe gongzuo.”
Wo que yi yong ji ge hanzai he qianshou zhi nian chengzhile falao de renmin, yibian tamen jieshou quangao.

Dang xingfu jianglin tamen shi, tamen jiu shuo:“Zhe shi women ying de de.” Dang tamen zaoyu eyun shi, tamen jiu ba ta guijiu yu mu sa ji tongban dai lai de buxiang. Qishi, tamen [suo zao] de eyun shi cong an la jiang shi de, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Tamen [dui mu sa] shuo:“Buguan ni na shenme jixiang lai mihuo women, women dou bu hui xiangxin ni.”
Yinci, wo jiang hongshui, huangchong, shizi, qingwa he xieye qu chengfa tamen, zhexie shi mingxian de jixiang. Dan tamen jiao'ao zi da, tamen shi fanzui de minzhong.

Mei dang tianzai [zhu] jianglin tamen shi, tamen jiu shuo:“Mu sa a! Qing ni ti women qiu ni de zhu ba! Yinwei ta yu ni you yue zai xian, jiaru ni neng wei women xiaochu tianzai, women yiding xiangxin ni, yiding rang yiselie de houyi tong ni yiqi likai.”
Dan dang wo zhanshi wei tamen xiaochule tamen bixu duguo de tianzai shi, tamen mashang jiu beixinqiyile.
Yinci, wo chengfale tamen, wo ba tamen yan si zai haili, yinwei tamen fouren bing hushi wo de jixiang.

Wo rang bei renwei shi ruozhe de minzhong jichengle dadi de [suoyou] dongfang he [suoyou] xifang [ji dongnan xibei], na shi wo cengcifu di difang. Youyu yiselie de houyi neng rennai, ni de zhu shixianle dui tamen di meihao nuoyan. Wo huimiele falao he ta de renmin de yeji ji tamen suo jianzao de.

Wo shi yiselie de houyi [anquan] duguole hai, ranhou, tamen lai dao yige chongbai ouxiang [zhu] de minzu nali. Tamen shuo:“Mu sa a! Qing ni wei women zuo yige ouxiang, jiu xiang tamen suo yongyou de ouxiang yiyang.” Ta shuo:“Nimen que shi wuzhi de minzhong.
Youyu zhexie ren chongbai ouxiang, tamen bi jiang bei huimie, tamen suo zuo de yiqie zhishi tulao.”
Ta shuo:“An la ceng shi nimen you yu shiren, wo zen neng she ta er wei nimen xunqiu ling yige zhuzai ne?”

Dangshi, wo cong falao de renmin zhong zhengjiule nimen, tamen canku de nuedai nimen, sha si nimen de nanhai, er rang nimen de funu huozhe. Ci zhong que you cong nimen de zhu jiang shi de zhongda kaoyan.
